entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><polygon points='12 2 2 7 12 12 22 7 12 2'></polygon><polyline points='2 17 12 22 22 17'></polyline><polyline opacity='.4' points='2 12 12 17 22 12'></polyline></svg>
entries.title: Tasks planner
entries.description: Plan and schedule your weekly tasks on web or mobile through our desktop or mobile apps.

entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><rect x='4' y='4' width='16' height='16' rx='2' ry='2'></rect><rect opacity='.3' x='9' y='9' width='6' height='6'></rect><line x1='9' y1='1' x2='9' y2='4'></line><line x1='15' y1='1' x2='15' y2='4'></line><line x1='9' y1='20' x2='9' y2='23'></line><line x1='15' y1='20' x2='15' y2='23'></line><line x1='20' y1='9' x2='23' y2='9'></line><line x1='20' y1='14' x2='23' y2='14'></line><line x1='1' y1='9' x2='4' y2='9'></line><line x1='1' y1='14' x2='4' y2='14'></line></svg>
entries.title: Team collaborations
entries.description: Invite unlimited team members to view, edit, comment and create landing pages with you.

entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'><circle cx='18' cy='18' r='3'></circle><circle cx='6' cy='6' r='3'></circle><path opacity='.4' d='M13 6h3a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v7'></path><line opacity='.4' x1='6' y1='9' x2='6' y2='21'></line></svg>
entries.title: Version control
entries.description: Full integration with Git, GitLab and Bitbucket to easily allow version control.

entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' ><path d='M17 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-4-4H5a4 4 0 0 0-4 4v2'></path><circle cx='9' cy='7' r='4'></circle><path opacity='.4' d='M23 21v-2a4 4 0 0 0-3-3.87'></path><path opacity='.4' d='M16 3.13a4 4 0 0 1 0 7.75'></path></svg>
entries.title: AB testing
entries.description: Create unlimited AB tests for your landing pages and make the designs public or private.

entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' ><path d='M19 16.9A5 5 0 0 0 18 7h-1.26a8 8 0 1 0-11.62 9'></path><polyline opacity='.4' points='13 11 9 17 15 17 11 23'></polyline></svg>
entries.title: One-click export
entries.description: Export your completed landing pages to HTML in both Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS format.

entries.svg: <svg class='w-100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' ><circle opacity='.4' cx='12' cy='12' r='2'></circle><path d='M16.24 7.76a6 6 0 0 1 0 8.49m-8.48-.01a6 6 0 0 1 0-8.49m11.31-2.82a10 10 0 0 1 0 14.14m-14.14 0a10 10 0 0 1 0-14.14'></path></svg>
entries.title: Mobile application
entries.description: Download our mobile app and continue to work on your landing pages through the mobile app.
